entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Smart string escape on paste broken with line copy/paste #61316
  • Extremely high OOP memory usage #61314
  • It looks like the "implement interface explicitly" option doesn't spit out static modifier for static events and properties. #61311
    17.3
  • The compiler should not report CS8347 when there is no danger of escape #61296
    Compiler.Next

Closed

  • InvalidCastException from embedded language bits #61270
    17.3
  • Improve sig info, error message formatting when working with complex generic code #53061
    Backlog
  • Signature info gets incomprehensible in presence of extension methods, generics and tuples #33609
    Backlog
  • [LSP] Filtering completion items for methods also filters delegates #60755
    17.3
  • The classes listed by the C# overrides glyph should be sorted by their depth in the class hierarchy. #58219
    17.3
  • .editorconfig does not have the ability to warn if a function is too long, or if the number of characters in a line exceeds 80 characters. #61021
  • Implement interface fixer doesn't spit out `static` modifier implementations of static members #53925
    17.0.P2
  • Records with `;` body break references to members from record attribute #60379
    17.3
  • IDE0060 Attribute Suppression is causing IDE0079 #61142
  • IDE0055 report incorrectly on region define in pragma #61163
  • Fade-out of unused variables or parameters and dark theme #61185
  • CrossAssemblySupportingAndNotSupportingCovariantReturns test throws if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60060
    Compiler.Next
  • Assertion hit in `SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert` #61284
    17.3
  • More user-friendly error when writing `unchecked` to declare an unchecked user-defined operator #61305
  • Source generators and different versions of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common #60702
  • C# refactor "Create and assign property" does not add appropriate white spaces around the assignment operator '=' #58750
    Backlog
  • Comment block conflicts with string content #61168
  • New Rename UI doesn't auto-focus #60035
    17.3
  • Using a more verbose qualification of the identifier of the return type of a property results in name conflict-related errors #61171
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable smart copy/paste when line-copy is involved. #61317
    Area-IDE
  • Change VB language version Roslyn.sln uses to "latest" #61313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Parse `unchecked` gracefully in operators #61309
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add missing node state transition #61308
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Show not keyword (and all other stuff) after and & or when they are treated as identifiers #61306
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Avoid caching indentation data that changes over time #61304
    Area-IDE
  • Remove parameter null-checking from the Language Feature Status list #61302
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Add an UWP OptProf test for IDE #61315
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix crash when a multi-line raw literal becomes a skipped token. #61312
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix several LSP completion kind mappings #61243
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Enable add usings on paste by default #61299
    Area-IDE, Next
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Relax assertion in SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert #61287
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use SegmentedHashSet<T> to eliminate LOH allocations in AsyncBatchingWorkQueue #61276
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update dependency versions for 4.2.0 publishing #61265
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61297
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update PublishData.json with new package #61298
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Revert "Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState"" #61283
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove eng/docker/mono.sh script #61292
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Add pointer for `AnalysisLevel` to warning waves doc #61196
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Make static respect modifier order #61289
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Allow skeletons to be reused in frozen-partial scenarios (for inheritance margin) #61286
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove document options provider #61228
    Area-IDE
  • Skip timing test #61222
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Need Design Review
  • Add support for frozen-partial projects, and have skeleton assemblies work effectively for them #61282
    Area-IDE
